transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, yes sir.
Customer: Haan ji Mohammad Shahnawaz ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji ji sir, bataiye Manish ji.
Customer: Ji kaise ho?
Executive: Sir badhiya apna bataiye sir.
Customer: Ekdam badhiya. Main ye puch raha tha kuch pata nahi buyleads aur ka isme abhi jo hai, mere ko Visakhapatnam ka randomly dikhai nahi raha hai kuch kabhi kabhar.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Chairs ke zyada aa rahe hain mota moti mere ko aur kuch aa hi nahi rahe pata nahi kya ho gaya.
Executive: Check kar leta hu sir main ek second.
Customer: Kya naam hai? Main link share karta hu aapko main proper aapko guide karta hu. Aapko reporting system aapne negative mark kara hua hai matlab out of stock mark kara hua hai.
Customer: Ye product hai aapke.
Customer: To kya dikkat aa rahi thi sir ki Visakhapatnam ke lead nahi show ho rahi hai ya kisi particular product ke lead nahi aa rahi hai ye bataiye sir.
Customer: Particular product sir kuch bhi sirf chair dikha raha hai. Abhi 70 ke lead hai.
Executive: Jaise ki abhi kya hai ki jaise sirf
Customer: Do minute.
Customer: Sir ek minute.
Executive: Okay okay no issue.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes sir.
Customer: Haan actually kya ho raha hai ki buylead wale page mein jaane ke baad sara sirf chair ka dikhai de raha hai aur ek do hot box dikhai de raha hai baki jaise beech mein maine jab search kiya tha for example plastic dustbin ka to matlab tha dustbin ka par mere ko mere buylead wale page mein aaya nahi jab main search kiya to mere ko aaya. Ab fir yahi hai for example medical kuch bhi boxes transparent boxes ye sab jo maine rakh ke rakhe hai medical boxes karke wo bhi mere ko direct isme nahi aa rahe na mere buylead wale page mein jab main search kar raha hu tab mere ko aa raha hai ki Vizag mein availability hai aur maine wo location bhi upar se set kar ke rakha hai ki Andhra Pradesh aur ye sabhi.
Executive: Okay okay. Dekhiye sir relevancy wala ye jo buyleads jo chair aur in sab cheezon ke liye isliye aa rahi hai zyada matlab aapke tab pe isliye reflect ho rahi hai kyunki iski aapne buyleads vgera consume abhi kari hai. Abhi as such dustbin aur jo bhi other product aapke honge kyunki abhi kuch hi time hua hai aapko service list pe to un services mein aapne zyada buylead use nahi kiya hai sir. To jaise aapne search karne ke baad aapko do teen buylead jo bhi show ho rahi hai wo aap kuch din tak use karoge jaise maan lijiye ki do char panch buylead ek particular product ki jab use ho jayegi sir to directly aapko fir wo directly type aapko reflect dene lagega. Visakhapatnam wale cheez mein kuch dikhai nahi raha hai. Visakhapatnam mein sirf sirf plastic chair plastic chair plastic chair wo bhi do dikha raha hai. Sir teen to nikal ja raha hai sir Andhra Pradesh kuch alag chair vagere dikha raha hai chair dining table jisme maine beech mein bahut sari buylead dusri cheeze bhi use ki hai for example to mere ko us sab cheezon ka dikhai nahi raha kyunki suddenly change hua hai mera iske wajah se main baat kar raha hu. Baki aur jaise mere products sabhi cheeze can van ye sab hai tray aur ye sab hai crate aur ye sab ye direct mere ko aa hi nahi raha hai kuch ye sab matlab jisme maine use bhi kiye search kar kar ke maine use kiye for example stool ki use kiye aur do teen cheeze dabbon ki use kiye par fir wo search karne pe aa raha hai iske liye to faltu ka kho jaunga main koi lead iske liye.
Executive: Okay okay main samajh gaya sir. Jaise abhi sir main bata de raha hu abhi jo aapne mainly buylead use kari hai jo sabse zyada use kari hai wo hot case aur plastic chair ki kari hai sir theek hai right? To in dono categories ki aapko abhi aa rahi hai jaise main ab bata bhi de raha hu sir ki hot case ki aapne 15 buylead use kari hai abhi tak aur plastic chair ki 14 buylead use kariye sir. Third one agar aapka main dekhu to plastic insulated kuch kar ke hai sir casserole kar kar ke hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Uski buylead aapne use kari hai to ye aapke pass
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan haan boliye. Main ye puch raha tha ki plastic insulated casserole jo hai wo aapke pass available hai product mein ya nahi hai?
Executive: Hai na.
Executive: Okay to iski aapne add hi nahi kiya sir ye product aapke catalog mein may be add nahi hai sir.
Customer: Casserole to add hai iske liye dekho hot casserole kar kar ek hai wo added hai uska matlab mere ko buylead se wahi usi ka dikha raha hai aap samajh rahe ho storage boxes bhi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Dekhiye sir yahi teen char products hai jiski main abhi tak matlab jo system capture kar paya hai aur bhi product ke aapne buylead use kari hai aisa nahi hai jaise ki main bata bhi deta hu aapko aapne ice storage box ki bhi do teen buylead use kari hai to ye jaise hi aath 10 buylead above jayega sir jaise ki abhi chair aur aapka dusra product ho gaya ye hot case sir ye dono already ho chuka hai sir theek hai. Abhi ye wali bhi dheere dheere aapki chali jayegi kyunki abhi maan lijiye aapne saat aath buylead kisi kisi product ki kiye kisi ki che panch char kiye jaise hi wo 10 ke above jayega sir to aapko recommendation automatically aana start ho jayega sir wo system ke hi haath mein hai sir. Agar fir bhi nahi aayega sir to fir main isme kuch changes kar kar ke dekhunga sir kyunki agar directly abhi se hi agar isme kuch chhed chhad karu na sir to cheeze may be sahi hone ki jagah galat bhi ho sakti hai to that's why thoda to time dena padega sir isko matlab at least ek week aur try kijiye aur uske baad agar nahi aata hai sir to may be main isme kuch aapko connect kar kar ke kuch aur different hum log karenge sir isme jaise preferred cities bhi aati hai not preferred cities bhi hoti hai sir to un sab cheezon pe main extra kaam karunga sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai alright theek hai dhanyavad thank you.
Executive: Iske liye please ek week aur matlab thoda sa wahi search wala jo pattern aap use kar rahe hain sir wo to bahut hi achcha hai kuch din tak aap search kar kar ke use kijiye ek week tak sir ek week mein ho jayega may be relevancy effect sir aapki cheez use ho jayegi to then you will get the all other lead also sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai alright.
Executive: Main aapko ek week baad khud se hi call kar lunga no worry sir uske liye main khud se hi.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Visakhapatnam leads not showing randomly.

- Only chair leads are showing.

- Other product leads are not showing.



Resolution:

- Explained relevancy of buyleads.

- Suggested using buyleads for other products.

- Will check and make changes if needed.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to try for a week.

- Executive will call after a week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product, visakhapatnam, chair
